EVM tools is an easy to use extension for web3 and solidity developers. It has 22+ utilities for web3 developers. Utilities and updates are done on frequent basis. 

These tools help developers to test and debug during development. Some of the tools include-

- Gas converter, byte conversion, hex conversion etc.

- Uniswap V4 Hooks checker and contract template creator

- Epoch Converter

- Bit Manipulation, masking etc

- Generate burner addresses

- Merkle Tree Generator (using secure openzeppelin libraries, provides easy debugging for whitelisting)

- EVM Transaction Decoder 

- Checksum Formatter

- EVM Address book

- Contracts UI Generator

All the features are also available on the website. You can directly report any bugs or feature request using feedback on https://www.evmtools.xyz

New tools are added on a frequent basis.
